InventoryID: St. David's (Pa.), Mrs. John F. Arndt
Imagery Description: (a) Bearded silen, in threeNon Sepcifiedquarter view, holding situla and torch, moving to l., followed by Dionysos with phiale, beadNon Sepcifiedwreath, and thyrsus; above to l., bust of maenad, wearing fawnNon Sepcifiedskin, and holding bell in r. hand, phiale and beadNon Sepcifiedwreath in l., (b) A3c + A2r, with 'skewer of fruit'.
